title: How to Make Cherry Upside Down Cake

steps.headline: Melt the quarter cup of butter or margarine and spread in the baking pan.
Mix the cherries with the sugar and pour into the pan.
Mix together all of the ingredients and pour over the cherries in the baking pan.
Immediately after baking, invert the cake and put it on a serving plate.

text: Top: Melt the quarter cup of butter or margarine and spread in the baking pan.  Mix the cherries with the sugar and pour into the pan.  Cake Portion: Preheat the oven to 400 °F (204 °C).  Mix together all of the ingredients and pour over the cherries in the baking pan.  Bake for 30 minutes.  Immediately after baking, invert the cake and put it on a serving plate.
